video_title: Robin Guerchon(Ministry of interior - Cyberspace)-Cryptoassets security: protecting people and funds
description:
With Akli LE COQ, Alexis Evain (Ministry of interior - Cyberspace) and Lucas Cherfils (ADAN)
Proof aggregation compresses multiple proofs into one, revolutionizing proving frameworks. In this talk, Iâ€™ll show how this concept generalizes to sharding programs into smaller pieces, enabling efficient proof generation and verification in zkVMs.

transcript.aggregated_text: [Music] good morning let's talk about crypto asset security and the recent collaboration between the French Ministry of Interior it is to say the cyber command which is an agency and adan the industry association to address the issue of protecting people and funds first this chart represents French ecosystem for combating cyber crime in France the fight against cyber crime is treated extremely seriously by the government and a group of central agencies are specifically in charge of dealing with this issue on the left we have the NC which reports directly to the prime minister on the top it is a central institution responsible for national cyber security moving on to the second column the Ministry of Defense has its own cyber command cyber command next the Ministry of Justice has a section dedicated to fighting cyber crime it is called G3 and it's located in the tribunal dear now in the first column the ministry of interior and the the com cyber mile which we are honored to represent today reports directly to the ministry of the interior our cyber command is more specifically dedicated to strategy anticipation training and prevention we to support central services fighting cyber crime which belong to police jean or Paris police they all comprise highly skilled investigators on this slide you can see some key figures from the French Ministry of Interior a total of 348,000 cyber crime related complaints were received in 2024 marking an impressive 75% increase over the past five years as you can see the vast majority of offenses relate to property mainly fraud almost a third relate to offenses against individuals such as online 8 child sexual abuse material or doxing one of the most important thread for everyone are data leaks france has been a hit by this issue numerous major companies particularly telecom companies have been affected and through them virtually millions of users their credentials and access are compromised not only some actors illegally make money by selling the data but alo users are targeted by fishing scammers or malicious phone calls eventually as many experts have not there has also been a slight
